SEARCH
Package com.example.atlasevents.data

Class EventRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.atlasevents.data.EventRepository
public class EventRepository extends Object
Repository class for handling CRUD operations on Event objects in Firebase Firestore.

Provides methods to add, retrieve, update, delete, and search for events. All operations are performed asynchronously and use callback interfaces to return results.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    EventRepository.EventCallback
    Callback interface for operations that return a single event.
    static interface 
    EventRepository.EventsCallback
    Callback interface for operations that return a list of events.
    static interface 
    EventRepository.EventUpdateCallback
    Callback interface for event update operations.
